data.title: Amanda MacLeod on LinkedIn: CAST AI Appoints Pierre
data.meta_description: More exciting news at CAST AI… I am excited to welcome Pierre-Andre Liduena to the team as our new CFO! Pierre's background across finance, operations…
data.text:
Glad to share with all of you my new article in the Next-Gen FP&A (XP&A) Weekly Series #4 : 🤖𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐡𝐚𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐅𝐏&𝐀 𝐅𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐆𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐀𝐈 🚀 Generative AI isn't just tweaking FP&A; it's entirely reimagining the field. From turning mundane tasks into automated wonders 🤖 to equipping us with strategic foresight 🔮, AI is becoming the spine of financial planning and analysis. 1️⃣ Automated Data Analysis: With Generative AI, data transforms from mere numbers to a captivating narrative 📚, offering real-time insights, reducing errors, and enhancing cost efficiency. It's like having a financial storyteller at your side! 🧙♂️ 2️⃣ Enhanced Forecasting Accuracy: AI turns forecasting into a precise art 🎨, guiding us through the financial seas with the confidence of a seasoned captain. 🚢 3️⃣ Streamlined Budgeting Process: Imagine slashing planning time by up to 40%! AI makes budgeting a breeze, allowing us to focus on growth and innovation. 🌱 4️⃣ Collaborative Decision-Making: AI fosters a symphony of strategic harmony, where every team member's voice contributes to the grand masterpiece of financial success. 🎻 5️⃣ Risk Management and Mitigation: AI illuminates the path through the fog of uncertainties, ensuring our financial voyage is safe and prosperous. 🛡️ Generative AI is not just an upgrade to FP&A; it's a revolution, ushering in an era of unparalleled efficiency, insight, and collaboration. It's making the intricate world of finance more accessible, predictable, and manageable. 🌍✨ 🔔 Stay tuned for our weekly series on Extended Planning and Analysis (xP&A)! Each week, we'll dive deep into strategies, tips, and insights that will empower you and your team to lead with confidence and innovation. We're on a mission to make complex finance concepts simple and actionable for everyone. So, are you ready to be a part of this financial revolution? How is your team adapting to the new era of FP&A? Share your thoughts and experiences below! Let's learn and grow together. 👉 Like, Share, and Comment to join our journey! Your insights could lead the way to a brighter, smarter financial world. 💬💼 Many thanks Hub of Finance Transformation and Femto FP&A. #Finance ##GenAI

The best VCs I’ve met come into our meeting with an opinion on the space I’m operating in. We very quickly get past the high level topics and get into the hard questions. What are the key drivers to winning in this market? What are the advantages of building in one workflow vs another? What does it mean to build an AI-native accounting solution? These meetings are win-win. I always leave these meetings having learned something new. And I hope the VC leaves the meeting with a deeper understanding of how we are building this company. Looking forward to catching up with several of you soon. If you have an opinion on AI for the CFO suite / Accounting, let’s talk Lastly, shout out to the Truewind investors who truly exemplify what it means to be value-add. Whether it’s facilitating partnership discussions, making customer introductions, inviting us to speak at conferences, or simply pick up the phone at 11pm at night. Thank you.

As your company scales, it's essential to keep an eye on how well your processes and tools are holding up. If you're noticing more confusion in communication or your meetings are getting crowded, it might be time for a change. How about implementing some new tools or tech? Good idea, if done correctly. 🎙️ In our latest episode of CFO Weekly, Melissa Howatson of Vena Solutions joins Megan Weis to discuss why CFOs and finance teams should not reinvent the wheel with new tools and processes and why, at times, the best solution might be making current processes more efficient, particularly when it comes to navigating new trends such as AI. Check out the episode at the following link: https://hubs.la/Q02JKl7K0 #CFOweekly #FinanceTech #NewTools
